name: contextmenuplus
author: Siavash Askari Nasr
description: ContextMenuPlus adds extra items to context menu(right-click menu): Copy Page Title, Copy Page URL, Copy as HTML Link, Copy as Link, Open Page Hostname, Copy as Plain Text, Copy as HTML, Copy Link Text, Copy Feed URL, Paste & Submit, Show Google PageRank, ...

preferences.name: copyPageTitle
preferences.title: Copy Page Title
preferences.description: Copies title of the page.

preferences.name: copyPageURL
preferences.title: Copy Page URL
preferences.description: Copies URL of the page.

preferences.name: copyPageTitleAndURL
preferences.title: Copy Page Title and URL
preferences.description: Copies title and URL of the page, separated with a newline character.

preferences.name: copyTitleAndURLOfAllTabs
preferences.title: Copy Title & URL of all Tabs
preferences.description: Copies titles and URLs of all open tabs, separated with newline characters.

preferences.name: copyAsHTMLLink
preferences.title: Copy as HTML Link [Page Context]
preferences.description: Copies an HTML link of the page. e.g., PotatoZone

preferences.name: copyAsLink
preferences.title: Copy as Link [Page Context]
preferences.description: Copies a normal clickable link of the page.

preferences.name: openPageHostname
preferences.title: Open Page Hostname
preferences.description: Opens hostname of the page. e.g., on "http://potatozone.com/en/projects/", opens "http://potatozone.com/"

preferences.name: copyAsPlainText
preferences.title: Copy as Plain Text
preferences.description: Copies selected text without formatting.

preferences.name: copySelectionAsHTMLLink
preferences.title: Copy as HTML Link [Selection Context]
preferences.description: Copies an HTML link. Selected text is used for its name and page URL is used for its "href" attribute.

preferences.name: copySelectionAsLink
preferences.title: Copy as Link [Selection Context]
preferences.description: Copies a normal clickable link of the page. Selected text is used for its name.

preferences.name: copyAsHTML
preferences.title: Copy as HTML
preferences.description: Copies HTML code of selection as it is in the page source.

preferences.name: copyTextAndURL
preferences.title: Copy Text and URL
preferences.description: Copies selected text and URL of the page, separated with a newline character.

preferences.name: copyLinkText
preferences.title: Copy Link Text
preferences.description: Copies name of the link.

preferences.name: copyLinkTextAndURL
preferences.title: Copy Link Text & URL
preferences.description: Copies name and URL of the link, separated with a newline character.

preferences.name: copyLinkTextAndPageURL
preferences.title: Copy Link Text & Page URL
preferences.description: Copies name of the link and URL of the page, separated with a newline character.

preferences.name: copyAsPlainLink
preferences.title: Copy As Plain Link
preferences.description: Copies the link without formatting.

preferences.name: openLinkHostname
preferences.title: Open Link Hostname
preferences.description: Opens hostname of the link.

preferences.name: stopLoadingImage
preferences.title: Stop Loading Image
preferences.description: Stops the image from being loaded.

preferences.name: copyFeedURL
preferences.title: Copy Feed URL
preferences.description: Shows feeds of the page in a sub-menu. By clicking on a feed, you can copy its URL.

preferences.name: pasteAndSubmit
preferences.title: Paste & Submit
preferences.description: When used on a text input or textarea, pastes the clipboard content, then submits the form.

preferences.name: showPageRank
preferences.title: Show Google PageRank
preferences.description: Shows Google PageRank for the current page.

preferences.name: ptextAndPtitleHotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey for Copy as Plain Text, Copy Page Title
preferences.description: Ctrl+Shift+[a-z, 0-9]

preferences.name: copyPageURLHotkey
preferences.title: Hotkey for Copy Page URL
preferences.description: Ctrl+Shift+[a-z, 0-9]

preferences.name: pasteAndSubmitHotKey
preferences.title: Hotkey for Paste & Submit
preferences.description: Ctrl+Shift+[a-z, 0-9]
